#5
#5.a
a_fun<- function(n) {
  ro<-0:(n-1)
  co<-0:(n-1)
  result<-outer(ro,co,function(x,y) (x+y)%%n)
  return(result)
}
res_a<- a_fun(5)
res_a
#5.b
res_b<- a_fun(10)
res_b
#5.c
c_fun<- function(n) {
    ro<-0:(n-1)
    co<-0:(n-1)
    result<-outer(ro,co,function(x,y) (n-x-y)%%n)
    return(result)
}
res_c<- c_fun(9)
res_c

fun<- function(n) {
    ro<-1:n
    co<-1:n
    result<-outer(ro,co,function(x,y) abs(x-y)+1)
    return(result)
}
A<-fun(5)
y<-matrix(c(7,-1,-3,5,17),5,1)
x<- solve(A,y)
x
